name: Vidisha Shah
desc: Passionate MERN stack developer committed to optimizing Developer Experience. Proficient in creating user-centric web solutions and supporting fellow developers. Let's innovate and build exceptional experiences together! ðŸš€ðŸ’»
subheading: Crafting digital experiences, one commit at a time, from Nuremberg, Germany.
about:
As a Full-Stack Developer specializing in the MERN stack, I bring over 3 years of experience, having served as a Technical Assistant Director and Frontend Developer.

I hold an MSc. in Information Technology from Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology, India.

Seeking to broaden my skill set, I initiated a Full-Stack Web Development bootcamp, equipping myself with the expertise needed to create and enhance digital products with a user-centric approach.

Proficient in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and the MERN stack, I possess a unique skill set that seamlessly blends technical excellence with effective project management.

My objective is to leverage this diverse background to contribute significantly to the development and enhancement of digital products, placing a strong emphasis on delivering exceptional user experiences. With a commitment to innovation and a holistic approach to web development, I am eager to bring my skills to your team and contribute to the success of your projects.
subheading4: Explore some of my handcrafted projects, meticulously coded from inception to completion.

projects.title: Curriculum Builder
projects.description: Curriculum Builder is a full stack application. User can build their CVs online by using our application. The user experience includes real-time preview features. Project has been created with React Js, Node Js, Express Js, Mongo DB and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: The Dream Holiday Apartment
projects.description: The Dream Holiday Apartment is utilized to oversee the administrative section of the website. It is is built with React Js. We have utilized react-bootstrap and Bootstrap dependencies for styling.

projects.title: Angry Bird Shooting Game
projects.description: Angry Bird Shooting Game is web based shooting game. Project has been created with plain HTML, Javascript and CSS.

contact-subheading: Feel free to reach out to me via email or connect with me on LinkedIn. I welcome any opportunity to engage in meaningful conversations. Whether you have questions, need assistance, or just want to say hello, don't hesitate to drop me an email.
